taskbody.prereq: To view or change your personal information in MyPack Portal:
taskbody.context: On the Personal Information tile, you will be able to view and update all of your personal information

step.info: On the Personal Information tile, you'll be able to view and update all of your personal information, including personal details, contact information, addresses, emergency contacts, privacy restrictions, residency, your SSN, and parent and guardian access.
